FuncDef: The display paf command displays information about a PAF file in the system. The display paf command displays information about a PAF file in the system.

ParaDef.Info:
Detailed information about PAF(Product Adaptive File).
-

ExtraInfo: A PAF file effectively controls product features or resources to be used. To view information about all the specifications configured in the PAF file, run the display paf command.
